    Configuration

    William K. Morris

    Source: vignettes/configuration.Rmd
    configuration.Rmd

    The FinBIF Biodiversity Indicators Service (FBI) is configured using a YAML file. The file can be accessed and edited here (requires authentification)

    default:
  indices:
  - code: wb
    name: Winter birds community temperature index
  - code: bf
    name: Farmland butterflies
  - code: bfcti
    name: Farmland butterflies community temperature index
  - code: bfoa
    name: Butterfly overall abundance
  surveys:
    selection:
    - document_id
    - location_id
    - year
    - month
    - day
    has_value:
    - document_id
    - location_id
    - year
    - month
    - day
  counts:
    abundance: abundance
  use_data_after: "01-01"

    Developed by William K. Morris.
